content: bbl single_crochet 6 times bbl single_crochet bbl single_crochet bbl single_crochet to end join 42 sts round 33 chain 1 *single_crochet 4 decrease around join 35 sts round 34 chain 1 bbl decrease bbl single_crochet around join 28 sts round 35 chain 1 single_crochet 2 decrease around join 21 sts rnds 36 & 37 chain 1 single_crochet around join rnds 38 & 39 chain 1 half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet 14 half_double_crochet 4 join 21 sts fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing firmly stuff the entire body including the neck disclaimer the character of shaun the sheep is not owned and in continuous rnds do not join or turn your work with black make magic_ring round 1 work 6 single_crochet in magic_ring pull ring tight mark first st for beg of round move marker up every round round 2 work 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 sts round 3 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 18 sts round 4 *2 from * around 48 sts round 9 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in each of next 7 single_crochet repeat from * around 54 sts rnds 10-15 single_crochet around round 16 *decrease single_crochet in next 16 repeat from *around 51 sts rnds 17-20 single_crochet around round 21 *decrease single_crochet in next 15 repeat from * around 48 sts rnds 22-25 single_crochet around round 26
